name: Luna
description: Luna is a gentle calf with a distinctive white star on her forehead. She's curious and often the first to greet visitors.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a strong and playful calf with a beautiful brown coat. He enjoys running around the pasture.

name: Lily
description: Lily has a unique light golden coat. She's calm and enjoys being brushed and petted.

name: Bruno
description: Bruno is the tallest among his peers with a deep black coat. He's developing a strong build and loves playing with hay.

name: Petal
description: Our youngest calf, Petal, has a delicate light red coat with white patches. She's particularly fond of her caretakers.

name: Orion
description: Orion has a unique pattern of spots that reminds us of a starry night. He's energetic and playful.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is one of our most social calves, often following the farm workers around. She has a beautiful cream-colored coat.

name: Atlas
description: Atlas is our strongest calf, already showing impressive muscle development. He has a red-brown coat and is quite protective of the younger calves.

name: Poppy
description: Poppy has a distinct red coat with white socks on all four legs. She's gentle and enjoys being around people.

name: Bolt
description: Bolt earned his name because he's the fastest runner among the calves. He has a sleek black coat with a white streak on his face.

name: Willow
description: Willow is slender with long legs and a light brown coat. She's quiet but very observant.

name: Samson
description: Our oldest calf, Samson, has a thick gray coat and is already showing signs of becoming a magnificent bull.

name: Clover
description: Clover is easy to spot with her unique green-tinged black coat in the sunlight. She's very affectionate.

name: Thunder
description: Thunder has a deep, resonant moo that sounds like distant thunder. He has a dark brown coat with black spots.

name: Blossom
description: Blossom has a unique pink tinge to her light brown coat. She's playful and enjoys being around the other calves.
